name: Tob's Repair Shop
description:
This overcooking inspired game allows you to take control of Tob the bot and run his shop! Turn recycled parts into brand new parts for your customer's the be amazed by! How long can you go?

wasd/arrow keys to move.

Either shift will allow you to sprint

Space to pickup items and the toolbox, hit it again to set them down.

More information on how to play in game!

Programmers: Josh Ritz, Diego Ochoa, Ryan Givens, Abbas Kahwaja, Dhananjay "Rohan" Das, and Jesus "JD" Chacon
Artists: Hillary "Vin" Mac and Aliya
Various sounds generated from https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
